section.title: Introduction
section.para: Globus XIO is a development API. The only administration required is to install it according to the GT &shortversion; installation instructions.

important.simpara: This information is in addition to the basic Globus Toolkit prerequisite, overview, installation, security configuration instructions in the . Read through this guide before continuing!

section.title: Deploying
section.para: Once a user has a successful installation of Globus XIO they may wish to use their own drivers. Once the driver is compiled, it can be used at runtime by Globus XIO so long as it can be found in the LD_LIBRARY_PATH.

listitem.simpara: The environment variable GLOBUS_LOCATION must be set to a valid Globus &shortversion; installation.

Various other environment variables must be set in order to easily use the GlobusXIO application. The proper environment can be established by running: source $GLOBUS_LOCATION/etc/globus-user-env.sh or source $GLOBUS_LOCATION/etc/globus-user-env.csh depending on the shell you are using.
